Creative Developer Portfolio Demo

Interactive Portfolio Website

This demo page showcases the key features and visual styles of the Creative Developer Portfolio website. The portfolio is designed with three distinct visual styles that transition as users scroll through different sections.

View Full Portfolio

Visual Styles

The portfolio features three distinct visual styles that create a unique browsing experience:

Old-School Style

Features a retro aesthetic with wheat-colored background, brown accents, monospace typography, and pixel-art inspired elements.

Modern Style

Features a contemporary look with dark blue background, vibrant purple accents, clean sans-serif typography, and smooth animations.

Minimalist Style

Features a clean, minimal design with white background, subtle gray accents, minimal decoration, and focus on typography and whitespace.

Combined Preview

Scroll Transitions & Animations

The portfolio website features smooth, engaging animations that trigger as users scroll through the content:

Scroll-Based Transitions

Elements transition and transform based on scroll position, creating a dynamic and engaging user experience.

Style Transitions

Visual styles smoothly transition between sections, creating a cohesive yet varied browsing experience.

// Example of scroll-based animation implementation
gsap.registerPlugin(ScrollTrigger);

ScrollTrigger.create({
  trigger: "#projects",
  start: "top center",
  end: "bottom center",
  onEnter: () => gsap.to(".project-card", {
    opacity: 1,
    y: 0,
    stagger: 0.2,
    duration: 0.8
  }),
  onLeaveBack: () => gsap.to(".project-card", {
    opacity: 0,
    y: 50,
    stagger: 0.1,
    duration: 0.5
  })
});

Responsive Design

The portfolio is fully responsive and optimized for all device sizes:

  • Mobile-first approach ensures smooth experience on smartphones
  • Tablet-optimized layouts for medium-sized screens
  • Desktop layouts take advantage of larger screen real estate
  • Animations and transitions adapt to different screen sizes

Performance Optimizations

The website is optimized for fast loading and smooth performance:

  • Minified CSS and JavaScript files
  • Optimized image assets
  • Lazy loading for images
  • Efficient animation rendering
  • Reduced motion option for accessibility

Accessibility Features

The portfolio is designed with accessibility in mind:

  • Semantic HTML structure
  • ARIA attributes for enhanced screen reader support
  • Keyboard navigation support
  • Sufficient color contrast for text readability
  • Support for reduced motion preferences
